data.text:
Mass vaccination has posed a challenge to hospitals with the possibility of shortage of blood.

Help save a life, donate blood today before you vaccinate!

#DonateBlood #BloodDonor #BloodShortage #COVIDEmergency #IndiasCOVID #COVIDVaccineIndia #COVIDVaccination #COVID19Vaccine https://t.co/V9bBLZZDd8
